basic_node.title: Signal distance in atm. particle volume
basic_node.description: Distance of laser beam travelling through volume of particles in atmospheric aerosol and accumulated hydrometeors.
basic_node.references: [sp18, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: Transmission term T(R): Range R; p.10-11.] [sp18, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271611001158, Formula reference to be added.] [sp18, http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7535399/, Formula reference to be added.]
